projects.name: FireSlinger
projects.description: FireSlinger is a sidescrolling 2D shooter prototype created for my Senior Project. The built-in Rigidbody physics system in Unity isn't well suited for fast feelin of oldschool arcade platformers.

projects.name: TrackDota
projects.description: An Android app that allows you to get live updates and keep track of professional Dota 2 matches as they happen. Just like boxscores for baseball and other sports, TrackDota gives you a quick and simple breakdown of the game.

projects.name: Flux Shopping Cart
projects.description: Prototype of a product page and shopping cart functionality using React/Flux. The app accurately tracks inventory of products as well as the shoppping cart. Currently working on setting up a payment API like Stripe or Paypal to make it a fully functioning store page.
